attributes.action: Grater power to pursue offenders on mopeds and motorcycle
attributes.background: For the police to be given greater power to purse offenders on Mopeds and Motorcycle more easily and without fear of prosecution themselves.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what new powers you'd like the police to have. 

The Government are looking at possible changes to the law, guidance and training around police pursuits. You can find out more about that and how to respond here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/consultation-to-give-police-greater-confidence-to-pursue-suspects

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
